content: Want to buy Solana (SOL) & BONK (BONK) can also exchange with BTC or buy it with Skrill. I can offer 2% in your favor.My Skrill account is EU-verified. All my transactions is "Skrill to Skrill" and not credit card deposit's.Accepting Escrow here or at some P2P-website that offers Escrow.BUMP! 4th December 2023Buying Solana & BONK balance. 2% over market price.Can pay with Bitcoin or Skrill to Skrill. Escrow accepted.- Regards BabyB. 👼
